title: TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE
content:
0x5ABA3986D90D8A3B0x4D9FBD11// TaskPerformSequence
void TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE(Ped ped, int taskSequenceId);Parameters:ped: The ped to perform the sequence ontaskSequenceId: The sequenceId to performFor an example on how to use this please refer to OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK
codeBlocks:
// TaskPerformSequence
void TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE(Ped ped, int taskSequenceId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE
TaskPerformSequence(ped, 0)
